title: Gila Cliff Dwellings National Monument: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around       Traffic & Travel Tips NOTE: Although the distance from Silver City is only 44 miles via State Highway 15, the travel time is approximately two hours due to twisting and winding mountain terrain. The Cliff Dwellings parking lot and trailhead are two miles from the Gila Visitor Center. Public Transportation  There is no public transportation to the monument.
